Title: Épouse-moi mon pote
Writer: Khaled Amara (collaboration), Tarek Boudali (adaptation), Tarek Boudali (dialogue), Tarek Boudali (screenplay), Pierre Dudan (collaboration), Nadia Lakhdar (adaptation), Nadia Lakhdar (dialogue), Nadia Lakhdar (screenplay)
Actors: Tarek Boudali, Philippe Lacheau, Charlotte Gabris, Andy Raconte
Plot: To avoid deportation, Yassine asks his best friend Fred to marry him.
